paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

functional_data.summary: Functional data provided evidence criteria for 1 of 22 VUS and 6 of 72 variants with conflicting interpretation.

variants.additional_notes: The combined prevalence of germline LP/P variants in BRCA1 and BRCA2 was 1.5%.
key_quotes: One hundred patients (0.8%) had a germline finding of LP/P in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported with limited details.
